name: Dr. Shrink - Lost on the Insides
name_original: Dr. Shrink - Lost on the Insides
description:
You are Dr. Shrink.

You've been shrunken down to atomic size...Your mission is to explore our patient's insides, cure their disease, and escape!

This is a mini Metroidvania. Keyboard controls are as follow (though we HIGHLY recommend using a controller - sidenote: We've only tested with Xbox controllers. This was our first time working with Unity's new Input System, so we're unsure of how many controllers will work with this project.)

Move - WASD or arrow keys

Jump - Space

Dash - Q

Shoot - left Ctrl

We hope you have as much fun playing it as we did making it!
